ui_article.row_thumb_did: SELECT `data_article`.`sid` as `aid`, `data_article`.`kw`, `data_article`.`desc`, `data_article`.`thumb`, `data_article`.`title`, `data_article`.`date` FROM `data_article_dis` LEFT JOIN `data_article` ON `data_article`.`sid` = `data_article_dis`.`aid` WHERE `data_article_dis`.`did` = :did AND `data_article`.`thumb` IS NOT NULL ORDER BY `aid` DESC LIMIT 0,1
